body_html:
Hello,

I am having the same problem:


import tensorflow as tf

my_optimizer= tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=0.00000001)

my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-36-49765c0f1466>", line 1, in <module>
    my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'estimator'

But estimator is in tensorflow.contrib:


help (tensorflow.contrib)
Help on package tensorflow.contrib in tensorflow:

NAME
    tensorflow.contrib

PACKAGE CONTENTS
    all_reduce (package)
    batching (package)
    boosted_trees (package)
    cluster_resolver (package)
    coder (package)
    decision_trees (package)
    eager (package)
    estimator (package)
    feature_column (package)
    fused_conv (package)
    ...

I am having the same problem:

import tensorflow as tf

my_optimizer= tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=0.00000001)

my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):

File "", line 1, in
my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'estimator'
But estimator is in tensorflow.contrib:

    help (tensorflow.contrib)
Help on package tensorflow.contrib in tensorflow:

NAME
    tensorflow.contrib

PACKAGE CONTENTS
    all_reduce (package)
    batching (package)
    boosted_trees (package)
    cluster_resolver (package)
    coder (package)
    decision_trees (package)
    eager (package)
    estimator (package)
    feature_column (package)
    fused_conv (package)
in fact this same error happens with any function from tensorflow.contrib.

help (tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees)
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-38-b173108b832b>", line 1, in <module>
    help (tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'boosted_trees'

I am using tensorflow 1.7.
I am using anaconda, spider, windowns 10 .
I am going through this tutorial, if more details of the code are important: https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/mlcc/first_steps_with_tensor_flow.ipynb?hl=en#scrollTo=ubhtW-NGU802

Any idea of what is wrong?

body:
Hello,

I am having the same problem:
```

import tensorflow as tf

my_optimizer= tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=0.00000001)

my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-36-49765c0f1466>", line 1, in <module>
    my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'estimator'
```

But estimator is in tensorflow.contrib:
```

help (tensorflow.contrib)
Help on package tensorflow.contrib in tensorflow:

NAME
    tensorflow.contrib

PACKAGE CONTENTS
    all_reduce (package)
    batching (package)
    boosted_trees (package)
    cluster_resolver (package)
    coder (package)
    decision_trees (package)
    eager (package)
    estimator (package)
    feature_column (package)
    fused_conv (package)
    ...
```

I am having the same problem:

import tensorflow as tf

my_optimizer= tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=0.00000001)

my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-36-49765c0f1466>", line 1, in <module>
    my_optimizer = tf.contrib.estimator.clip_gradients_by_norm(my_optimizer, 5.0)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'estimator'
But estimator is in tensorflow.contrib:

```
    help (tensorflow.contrib)
Help on package tensorflow.contrib in tensorflow:

NAME
    tensorflow.contrib

PACKAGE CONTENTS
    all_reduce (package)
    batching (package)
    boosted_trees (package)
    cluster_resolver (package)
    coder (package)
    decision_trees (package)
    eager (package)
    estimator (package)
    feature_column (package)
    fused_conv (package)
in fact this same error happens with any function from tensorflow.contrib.

help (tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees)
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-38-b173108b832b>", line 1, in <module>
    help (tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees)

AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.contrib' has no attribute 'boosted_trees'

```

I am using tensorflow 1.7.
I am using anaconda, spider, windowns 10 .
I am going through this tutorial, if more details of the code are important: https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/mlcc/first_steps_with_tensor_flow.ipynb?hl=en#scrollTo=ubhtW-NGU802

Any idea of what is wrong?
